SELECT rn ,qna_no ,qna_title ,qna_content ,qna_regist_date ,qna_write ,qna_write_name ,qna_secret ,qna_password ,qna_reply_exist
FROM (SELECT rownum rn ,qna_no ,qna_title ,qna_content ,qna_regist_date ,qna_write ,qna_write_name ,qna_secret ,qna_password ,qna_reply_exist
FROM ( SELECT qna_no ,qna_title ,qna_content ,qna_regist_date ,qna_write ,qna_write_name ,qna_secret ,qna_password ,qna_reply_exist
FROM tbl_qna
ORDER BY qna_no ASC ))
WHERE rn > #{total} - ((#{criteria.pageNum}) * #{criteria.amount})
AND rn <= #{total} - ((#{criteria.pageNum} - 1) * #{criteria.amount})
ORDER BY rn DESC

SELECT qna.qna_no ,qna.qna_title ,qna.qna_content ,qna.qna_regist_date ,qna.qna_write ,qna.qna_write_name ,qna.qna_secret ,qna.qna_password ,reply.qna_reply_no ,reply.qna_reply_content ,reply.qna_reply_regist_date ,reply.member_id
FROM tbl_qna qna ,tbl_qna_reply reply
WHERE qna.qna_no = reply.qna_no
